statements: SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_performance;
SELECT ar_content_id, user_id FROM augmented_reality_performance;
SELECT timestamp, performance_metrics FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM augmented_reality_performance ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ar_content_id, performance_metrics->'fps' AS frames_per_second FROM augmented_reality_performance;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ar_content_id, user_id FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ar_content_id, COUNT(*) AS total FROM augmented_reality_performance GROUP BY ar_content_id ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE performance_metrics->>'fps' > '30' AND performance_metrics->>'memory_usage' < '500MB';
SELECT * FROM AR_Performance WHERE performance_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM AR_Performance;
SELECT ar_content_id, content_type FROM AR_Content WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM AR_Content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, performance_data->'duration' AS duration FROM AR_Performance;
SELECT * FROM AR_Performance WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT performance_id, ar_content_id, timestamp FROM AR_Performance WHERE ar_content_id IN (1, 2, 3) LIMIT 10;
SELECT ar_content_id, url, content_type FROM AR_Content WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY ar_content_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS performance_count FROM AR_Performance GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM AR_Performance p JOIN AR_Content c ON p.ar_content_id = c.ar_content_id WHERE c.content_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_performance;
SELECT ar_content_name, ar_performance_metrics FROM augmented_reality_performance;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM ar_devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE ar_content_name = 'AR Content 1';
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM ar_devices WHERE device_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ar_content_id, ar_performance_metrics ->> 'clicks' AS clicks FROM augmented_reality_performance WHERE ar_performance_metrics ->> 'clicks' > '100';

SELECT ar_content_name, ar_performance_metrics FROM augmented_reality_performance JOIN user_engagement ON augmented_reality_performance.ar_content_id = user_engagement.ar_content_id WHERE user_engagement.engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY user_engagement.engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM augmented_reality_content;
SELECT name, performance_score FROM augmented_reality_content ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT id, name, performance_score FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT ar.id, ar.name, fb.feedback FROM augmented_reality_content ar JOIN user_feedback fb ON ar.id = fb.ar_content_id;
SELECT ct.viewer_id, ar.name, ct.time_of_interaction FROM ar_content_tracking ct JOIN augmented_reality_content ar ON ct.ar_content_id = ar.id ORDER BY ct.time_of_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT name, performance_score FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE performance_score < 70;
SELECT user_id, ar_content_id FROM content_engagement WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE ar_content_id = 3 AND rating < 3;
SELECT id, name, performance_score FROM augmented_reality_content WHERE name LIKE 'AR%' ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Performance;
SELECT content_id, performance_score FROM AR_Performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, category FROM Content_Details WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM User_Details WHERE registration_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Content_Categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT content_name, category FROM Content_Details WHERE creator_id = 123 ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Details ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_id, performance_score FROM AR_Performance WHERE performance_score > 0.8 AND content_id IN (SELECT content_id FROM User_Interactions WHERE user_id = 456);
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM Content_Categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_count > 2 ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT * FROM AR_Performance JOIN Content_Details ON AR_Performance.content_id = Content_Details.content_id WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
